MemoryInfobox.description: 'After Kassandra had collected all of Leiandros' "Pre-Trial" tokens, she was determined to return and fight the Minotaur to win the Prize of Pephka.'

General_Description: '''Cashing In On the Cow''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra returned to [[Leiandros]] after completing the "Pre-Trials" and gaining the tokens associated.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra made her way to Leiandros in [[Warrior's Rest]] to turn in the Pre-Trial Tokens. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I have your ''malákes'' Tokens. No more games, no more schemes to rob me of my [[drachma]]e—
''It's time to slay a Minotaur! *'''Leiandros:''' ''Absolutely, ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''! No problem!
But ''first!
'' Perhaps you'd like to ''buy back'' your exquisite, finely-crafted Trial Tokens? This offer will expire in—'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''BY THE GODS!'' *'''Leiandros:''' ''They, uh make for fantastic gifts!'' |-|I ''will'' buy them back. [1200]= *'''Kassandra:''' ''It's strange... but I would like something to remember [[Pephka]] by.'' Kassandra gave Leiandros the drachmae and received the Tokens. |-|Keep them.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Not. Another. Drachma.'' *'''Leiandros:''' ''Oh but champion, surely you want something to help you remember the [[Pephka]] Pre-Trials?!'' Kassandra lunged at him. *'''Leiandros:''' ''I—sorry. Sorry sorry sorry.'' *'''Leiandros:''' ''Then all that's left is facing our star attraction himself—THE MINOTAUR! Are you ready to meet your doom?'' (Accept – "Bring on the Minotaur.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''If your "Pre-Trials" are anything to go by, yes. Yes I am.'' *'''Leiandros:''' ''Well, good! GREAT! I WANT you to fight the Minotaur!
You'll find the beast in the depths of the [[Cave of the Brave]] on the [[Dikte Plateau]]. Two other warriors have just completed their Pre-Trials—you can speak to them for more information.
They'll join you when you're ready to, you know, die horrifically.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You've come all this way—join us.'' Leiandros chuckled nervously. *'''Leiandros:''' ''No, no, no, no. I have a very important... pottery lesson to attend! So...'' Leiandros took off.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra reported her completion of the trials to Leiandros. She was then asked by him to join the other warriors ready to face the Minotaur.
Section_Trivia: *The name of this quest is a play on the marketing term "Cash Cow" meaning a company that has a high market share in a slow-growing industry, often resulting in major cashflows with little effort.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra made her way to Leiandros in [[Warrior's Rest]] to turn in the Pre-Trial Tokens.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have your ''malákes'' Tokens. No more games, no more schemes to rob me of my [[drachma]]e—
''It's time to slay a Minotaur!

*'''Leiandros:''' ''Absolutely, ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''! No problem!
But ''first!
'' Perhaps you'd like to ''buy back'' your exquisite, finely-crafted Trial Tokens? This offer will expire in—''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's strange... but I would like something to remember [[Pephka]] by.''
Kassandra gave Leiandros the drachmae and received the Tokens.
*'''Leiandros:''' ''Oh but champion, surely you want something to help you remember the [[Pephka]] Pre-Trials?!''
*'''Leiandros:''' ''Then all that's left is facing our star attraction himself—THE MINOTAUR! Are you ready to meet your doom?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If your "Pre-Trials" are anything to go by, yes. Yes I am.''

*'''Leiandros:''' ''Well, good! GREAT! I WANT you to fight the Minotaur!
You'll find the beast in the depths of the [[Cave of the Brave]] on the [[Dikte Plateau]]. Two other warriors have just completed their Pre-Trials—you can speak to them for more information.
They'll join you when you're ready to, you know, die horrifically.''
*'''Leiandros:''' ''No, no, no, no. I have a very important... pottery lesson to attend! So...''
